page.title: 17Healthy Steyning
page.content: The general health of people is very good now.A long time ago in Steyning lots of people died from{smallpox, {measles}and{colds.}Steyning is a very clean area now and there are laws which make sure that food is kept free from{germs.}So that is one reason why people are{healthier.}There is a {Health Centre}in Steyning which looks after people who are ill and to help stop us getting ill. In the past people didn't care where they put their{waste}.Now they put it in a{dustbin}and it is collected every week and taken away to be{burned}or {buried}deep in the ground. {Water}is also much{cleaner}than it used to be because{dirty}water goes to a special place to be{cleaned. Dirty water is not allowed to be pumped into rivers and the sea, although some people still do.
